T02D2427:40b-1: su kha du:kha aa dhya pa rirya gha drishti n'a ma /
T02D2427:40b-3: bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2427:40b-4: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2427:40b-5: sgom las 'das pa sgrub rgyu med //
T02D2427:40b-6: mgon po rnams kyi bdag nyid can //
T02D2427:40b-7: grub thob rnams kyi bla ma la //
T02D2427:40b-8: phyag 'tshal gnyis bral lta ba bshad //
T02D2427:40b-9: rang bzhin bsgom rgyu med pa'i phyir //
T02D2427:40b-11: dngos dang dngos min gnyis dang bral //
T02D2427:40b-12: de phyir kun rdzob grub pa med //
T02D2427:40b-13: dngos po sgom med dngos med min //
T02D2427:40b-14: rang bzhin dbyer med rgyu las 'das //
T02D2427:40b-15: nam yang rang bzhin ye shes te //
T02D2427:40b-16: zung 'jug dga' ba gnyis su med //
T02D2427:40b-17: dran pa dang bral dran med de //
T02D2427:40b-19: shes rab thabs kyi zung 'jug la //
T02D2427:40b-20: rnal 'byor gzhan gyi dgongs pa ni //
T02D2427:40b-21: dang po thabs ni bsgom pa'i phyir //
T02D2427:40b-22: mi rtog shes rab skad cig la //
T02D2427:40b-23: ma grub thabs kyang grub mi 'gyur //
T02D2427:40b-24: mthong min de ni bsgom pa min //
T02D2427:40b-25: gang zhig thabs ni sgom byed na //
T02D2427:40b-26: bla ma'i gdams ngag ldan pa yis //
T02D2427:40b-27: yang dag phyag rgya thabs nyid kyis //
T02D2427:40b-28: phra zhing rang bzhin ba rgyu ba //
T02D2427:40b-29: ye shes kun gyi bdud rtsi 'bab //
T02D2427:40b-30: mtshon pa'i 'od gsal skad cig la //
T02D2427:40b-31: blo ldan brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom //
T02D2427:40b-32: brtags pas ma grub rtog bral yin //
T02D2427:40b-34: chos sku'i mtshan mar sems gtad pas //
T02D2427:40b-35: rim gyis sleb pas de nyid min //
T02D2427:40b-36: sngar bzhin mtshan ma med gyur pas //
T02D2427:40b-37: rnam rtog dang bral bde chen 'grub //
T02D2427:40b-38: sna tshogs pa yi rigs pa rnams //
T02D2427:40b-39: rang rig gzhan gyis rig mi 'gyur //
T02D2427:40b-40: de rtogs nyin mtshan bde chen mnyam //
T02D2427:40b-41: gnyis dang gnyis med spangs gyur pa'i //
T02D2427:40b-42: gang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de //
T02D2427:40b-43: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs //
T02D2427:40b-44: de rtogs bdag med lta ba yin //
T02D2427:40b-45: rnal 'byor bde sdug gnyis dang bral //
T02D2427:41a-2: rtogs pas phyag rgya chen po thob //
